ygData.subject: Re: A tale of woe.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Wolf man, not bear.  Wolf is Very rare.  Heard, but never seen that they come off of one of the hounds in NK. And dont forget the every popular Player Made
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 18 Nov 1999 14:08:37 -0500, you wrote:

>HQ bear pelts are low % drop on a number of bears (notably kodiacs). I've
>seen at least a dozen. I could kick myself for selling them to the vendors
>then since I've seen them go for 50 plat a pop these days.
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>Heh heh, I'm with ya in spirit man! I'd say though that tailors too would
>dearly love to find a source of HQ wolf pelts to outfit all those halfling
>druids with reinforced leather. I've seen one in all my lifetimes!


Wolf man, not bear. Wolf is Very rare. Heard, but never seen that
they come off of one of the hounds in NK.

And dont forget the every popular Player Made Quiver. True, low
demand, but the patterns been here since day one, and still no-one
knows how to make it...
